title: Sans Serif — Vives logo
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_6111.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/N-18968-SidebarImg_4940.jpg)

Font: 

 Custom (Aller—DaMa) 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073151/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: Could be DaMa [Aller](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073151/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Aller) with a custom /i dot (square for Aller, circle for your sample).
